overall.description: Compute the ‘inverse’ of an N-dimensional array.

a.description: Tensor to ‘invert’. Its shape must be ‘square’, i. e., prod(a.shape[:ind]) == prod(a.shape[ind:]).

ind.description: Number of first indices that are involved in the inverse sum. Must be a positive integer, default is 2.

b.description: a’s tensordot inverse, shape a.shape[ind:] + a.shape[:ind].
